00158   void testInitialResponse(){
00159     tCurlAccountAddReturn ret=this->m_testedClass->getResponse();
00160     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( ret== CAA_UNDEFINED);

00170   void testEmptyName(){
00171     this->m_testedClass->setName("");
00172     bool bret=this->m_testedClass->perform();
00173     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( !bret);

00189     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( !bret);

00192     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( ret==CAA_EMPTY_PWD);

00202   void testEmptyMail(){

00206     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( !bret);

00220   void testMissingAt(){

00256   void testAddAccount(){

00261     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( bret==true);
00262

00303   void testMailExists(){
